response.original_title: PUNHA SHIVAJIRAJE BHOSLE YAJ SATHI KELA HOTA ATTHAS
response.overview: "Punha Shivaji Raje Bhosale" is a 2025 Marathi film,directed by Mahesh Manjrekar,and a sequel to the film Mi Shivajiraje Bhosale Boltoy. The movie is a socio-political drama that focuses on themes of Maharashtrian pride and identity.
response.title: PUNHA SHIVAJIRAJE BHOSLE YAJ SATHI KELA HOTA ATTHAS
